title: Until Death Do Us Part
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2O8m4Y5

by Lous

“Tell me you’re not on that ship.” I said uselessly.

“I’m sorry, Rhodey,” he admitted. “Long story short but I had no other choice. It finally happens, the endgame, and you need to bring back everyone together to protect Earth.” His voice trembled.

“I swear to God Tones, you better come back!”

“I will try my best, honey bear. I love y–”

“Tones? Tony are you there!?”

Rhodey is lost in the aftermath of the Snap. He didn’t know where Tony was, he didn’t know if he was dead or alive. It was as if he was back 9 years ago but worse. And this time, the only thing he could do was to wait for him…

Words: 4601, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

title: To Mend and Break 18
body:
Tony Stark made sure to keep his kids out of the limelight when he was granted custody of them after their mother’s death. The world knew very little of the Stark twins and Tony wanted to keep it that way. For the most part they knew one was a genius and the other was daddy’s spoiled princess. But when Tony starts acting out of control , the twins are thrown in the middle of the crossfire , allowing the world to really see them. They now have to make a choice that will change their lives forever.

After the battle in New York , you weren’t expecting things to go back to normal but you certainly weren’t expecting them to go to shit so fast. Your dad was suffering from PTSD. And even months after Loki brainwashing you with the scepter you were still suffering from it’s effects. Will you let your emotions get the best of you and your abilities? How can you keep yourself and your dad from going completely off the rails?

A/N : GIF not mine. Credit to owner.

Pairings: Tony Stark x daughter!reader x son!ofc


Reader’s POV

 Cold. Scared. Alone. Falling thru an endless void. 

 The memory of flying the nuke thru the wormhole and coming face to face with Chitauri command ship in space replayed in your nightmares over and over. 

 “You crave power.” “You can be so much more than what you are.”

Loki’s words replayed in your head along with memories of the scepter and all it showed you when you were under it’s control. 

The sounds of people screaming , the firing of guns , the roars and cries of animals deafening you. 

The feeling of bones breaking under your touch. 

A cold , dark and eerie corridor  leading you to pained screams. A red star painted over metal.

Flashes of green , red , purple, orange , yellow and blue.

 You wiped the sweat off your forehead. “Run it again.” You ordered. You did little small hops in place as the simulation cleaned itself up and prepared a new one. You looked over towards the ocean and sighed when you noticed the sun beginning to rise from the horizon. 

 “Y/N it’s nearly 6 in the morning. May I suggest we take a break and head inside for some shut eye.” Edwin Jarvis spoke. The list of what you could do continued to grow with each passing day as you explored your abilities. One was illusion casting. You’ve never met him , in fact you never knew J.A.R.V.I.S the AI was paid homage to an actual person in your dad’s life.

“No. Just start the simulation and record. Like I asked.” You remarked , waiving your hand at him. You were aggravated and straight up tired. You haven’t slept well in days since you learned to absorb your father’s fears in to you. You started off small at first , to make sure you would be able to control it and then once you gotten used to it you absorbed it completely. You channeled that fear in to controlling your abilities. He’s been sleeping like a baby ever since so you didn’t mind it. “Jarvis , I’m sorry.” You turned to face the illusion but he was already gone. 

You let out a sigh and walked over to the little set up of the table that had the laptop and the figurine. 

“I’ve been looking for that thing everywhere!” The familiar voice says just a few inches behind you and grabs the figurine. “What are you doing out here so early?” Anthony says and helps you with the equipment.

 “I was practicing.” You quietly thank him and start heading back towards the house. “I can’t sleep.”

“And here I thought you were hiding.” He jokes. The two of you go down the tunnel leading towards the garage.

 “We all know how well that worked out for me last time. Thanks for not having S.H.I.E.L.D come after me this time around.” You joke back. “I’m done hiding. We’ve both seen the kind of threats there are out there and what kind of horrible person would I be if I just stood by and let it happen knowing I can do what I do. That alien invasion really fucked with dad’s head and truth be told it’s fucking with mine.” 

“What’s fucking with you?” You heard your dad’s voice echo thru. He was in the middle of the garage testing another model of the Iron Man suit. “Oh , hey Jr. Didn’t know you were coming in.” 

“No way.” He laughed in excitement. He set down the figurine on the garage floor and rushed over to your dad to check out the new suit. “Mark 15? Where did you find the time to make 9 new suits?” He looked up at your dad in shock then looked back at you. You had made yourself comfortable in his desk chair and simply shrugged. “Is someone gonna answer my question?”

“It’s obvious. I’ve had a lot of free time on my hands.” Your dad shrugs. “Pepper’s running the company , Happy’s head of security and you kids are out doing your thing. I’m just doing what I do best.” Anthony looks up at your father confused.

“Take that thing for a test run , huh dad? When you get back we’ll have breakfast ready.” 

“Sounds like a plan.” He shuts the mask and waits for Anthony to move back , “See you in a bit.” He calls out as he flies out the tunnel.

 “What the hell? You wanna tell me what’s going on?” 

“I’ll explain while we cook him some breakfast. Unless you want to deal with dad while he’s hungry?”

“Point taken.”

——————————————

 “So you’ve been feeding off his fear?”  

“Not feeding off of him. God , you make me sound like a cannibal. I’ve just been removing that fear so he can sleep well. You should have seen him when I first got here. The man was a mess. Neck deep with designs on new Iron Man suits and prototypes of things he thought I could use. He was up for days before I even got here. He wouldn’t admit to it so I took matters in to my own hands.”

“By deceiving him in to thinking he’s getting better?” You set the plate of pancakes down on the table. Anthony followed shortly after with a plates of bacon and hash. 

“That’s not what I’m doing.” You justified. Anthony rolled his eyes not falling for the bullshit. “OK , you know what , sue me. He was using those machines as a distraction instead of addressing the problem. At least I had the decency to come check on him. Where the hell were you?!” 

“I’m gone for one hour and you two are already going at it?” Your dad is strolling in to the dining room in his day clothes now. “Do we need a time out shirt or do I need to go out and , I don’t know , buy new kids?” 

“I thought you liked our bickering?” You smirk. “I’ll grab the plates. Coffee?” 

“That smells amazing!” Your face lights up with happiness after hearing her voice. Pepper walks in to the dining room with a huge smile on her face. With Happy following right behind her.

“Pepper!” You rush over to her and embrace her in a tight hug. “I didn’t know you were gonna be joining us.”

“Are you kidding? You’re across the country and you’re finally all here together. I wasn’t gonna miss out on spending time with my favorite kids.” She smiles. Your dad clears his throat. “Oh , hush you. I see you everyday. So what are we having?” She walks across the dining room to join your dad and Anthony at the table and you continue towards the kitchen for the plate and utensils.

“Typical american breakfast. Go on , Happy , take a seat. We’ve made enough to feed an entire village.” You hear Anthony tell her. You set down the plates in front of everyone before taking a seat of your own.

 That morning  was filled with laughter , jokes and fun stories. It’s been a while since you were surrounded by happiness and love , you almost forgot about all those nightmares and New York. Almost. But you weren’t going to let that get in the way of enjoying your time with your family. Your dad was genuinely smiling and laughing with all of you , Happy was relaxed for once , and even with Stark Industries running smoothly  you can tell Pepper was enjoying this time as well. 

———————————

 You slammed shut the dishwasher after loading it and let out a huge yawn. The excitement from earlier made you forget how tired you really were. But after scarfing down all that delicious food it was catching up with you again.

 “No sleep again?” Your dad nearly startled you. You wiped your hair out of your face and chuckled softly. 

“I’m fine. Slowly slipping in to a food coma.” You lie. 

“Uh,  Pepper left these for you. She was in a rush to get back to the company but she wanted to make sure you got them.” He holds up a small stack of papers. “I’ve had a look at them and they’re no Picasso but they are good.” He jokes as you look thru each drawing. They were drawings of you in your combat gear. One alongside Iron Man and your brother in his lab coat with , what you could only assume were the Iron Man drones. Another one you were alongside the other Avengers. You looked over the others and you heart felt like it could just burst. 

 You let out a small laugh when you saw the one of you next to Captain America standing on top of a small hill of Chitauri Aliens and a heart drawn in between the two of you. “These are the cutest things I have ever seen.” You tell him.

“I hear Fury’s been wanting you on the team.” He casually leans back against the counter and folds his arms across his chest. You shake your head , folding the drawings in half and setting them down on the counter next to you.

“Don’t tell me you gave these to me so you can help his case.” You roll your eyes, “And like I told him. I’m not an Avenger. I just happen to be at the right place at the right time.”

“Sometimes that’s all it takes. I mean , you see how much the young ones look up to you. You saved thousands of people that day.”

“That’s nothing compared to the millions you saved.” You said without thinking. But to your surprise your dad didn’t flinch at the subtle mention of flying thru the wormhole. “Besides,” you quickly changed the subject. “I don’t think I would be able to handle the pressure of saving the world all the time.” 

“Compared to the pressure of taking care of me? That’s like a walk in the park.” He chuckled. 

You didn’t laugh along. “You’re my dad. Whether you like it or not I’m always gonna worry about you first.” The smile he had on his face disappeared. You watched him as he let out a long sigh and pushed himself off the counter.

“I don’t want your life to be all about worrying about me. To be honest I’m surprised you haven’t grown an ulcer from all the stress I’ve put on you. Intentional or not.” You opened your mouth to speak but he waved at you to be quiet, “just hear me out. I know what you’re doing here. I see what it’s done to you because of me. Honey , I love you.” He walked the short distance to you as he spoke and placed his hands on your shoulders. “I don’t want you to grow up regretting not doing things you should’ve at least taken a chance on. You’re 20 years old and you’re here with your old man. You know what I was doing when I was 20?”

“Please don’t tell me-”

“Creating you and your brother.”

“And you said it.” You roll your eyes. “So what you’re saying is you want me to go out and reproduce?” You chuckle.

“God no!” He gasps. “I just want you to go out and have a life that doesn’t revolve around taking care of me.”

“What’s wrong with that? If I didn’t know any better I think you just want me outta here.” 

“You caught me.” He raises his hands up. “I asked Pepper to move in and she agreed. We thought it was time.”

“And it is.” You smiled. “Yeah , ok. I get it. You two need your space.”

“Hey , but you know you’re always welcome here , right?”

“Of course. Whatever’s going on with you , just promise me you’ll get the help you need. Don’t let it get worse.” 

“I promise.” He holds his hand up as he says ,”Scout’s honor.” 

( @lizlil  @bookgirlunicorn @moli1497 @1awesomeash )

I see what it’s done to you because of me. Honey , I love you.” He walked the short distance to you as he spoke and placed his hands on your shoulders. “I don’t want you to grow up regretting not doing things you should’ve at least taken a chance on. “Creating you and your brother.”

“And you said it.” You roll your eyes. “So what you’re saying is you want me to go out and reproduce?” You chuckle.

“What’s wrong with that? If I didn’t know any better I think you just want me outta here.” 

“You caught me.” He raises his hands up. “I asked Pepper to move in and she agreed. We thought it was time.”

“And it is.” You smiled. “Yeah , ok. I get it. You two need your space.”

“Hey , but you know you’re always welcome here , right?”

trail.content_raw:
Tony Stark made sure to keep his kids out of the limelight when he was granted custody of them after their mother’s death. The world knew very little of the Stark twins and Tony wanted to keep it that way. For the most part they knew one was a genius and the other was daddy’s spoiled princess. But when Tony starts acting out of control , the twins are thrown in the middle of the crossfire , allowing the world to really see them. They now have to make a choice that will change their lives forever.

After the battle in New York , you weren’t expecting things to go back to normal but you certainly weren’t expecting them to go to shit so fast. Your dad was suffering from PTSD. And even months after Loki brainwashing you with the scepter you were still suffering from it’s effects. Will you let your emotions get the best of you and your abilities? How can you keep yourself and your dad from going completely off the rails?

A/N : GIF not mine. Credit to owner.

Pairings: Tony Stark x daughter!reader x son!ofc


Reader’s POV

 Cold. Scared. Alone. Falling thru an endless void. 

 The memory of flying the nuke thru the wormhole and coming face to face with Chitauri command ship in space replayed in your nightmares over and over. 

 “You crave power.” “You can be so much more than what you are.”

Loki’s words replayed in your head along with memories of the scepter and all it showed you when you were under it’s control. 

The sounds of people screaming , the firing of guns , the roars and cries of animals deafening you. 

The feeling of bones breaking under your touch. 

A cold , dark and eerie corridor  leading you to pained screams. A red star painted over metal.

Flashes of green , red , purple, orange , yellow and blue.

 You wiped the sweat off your forehead. “Run it again.” You ordered. You did little small hops in place as the simulation cleaned itself up and prepared a new one. You looked over towards the ocean and sighed when you noticed the sun beginning to rise from the horizon. 

 “Y/N it’s nearly 6 in the morning. May I suggest we take a break and head inside for some shut eye.” Edwin Jarvis spoke. The list of what you could do continued to grow with each passing day as you explored your abilities. One was illusion casting. You’ve never met him , in fact you never knew J.A.R.V.I.S the AI was paid homage to an actual person in your dad’s life.

“No. Just start the simulation and record. Like I asked.” You remarked , waiving your hand at him. You were aggravated and straight up tired. You haven’t slept well in days since you learned to absorb your father’s fears in to you. You started off small at first , to make sure you would be able to control it and then once you gotten used to it you absorbed it completely. You channeled that fear in to controlling your abilities. He’s been sleeping like a baby ever since so you didn’t mind it. “Jarvis , I’m sorry.” You turned to face the illusion but he was already gone. 

[[MORE]]

You let out a sigh and walked over to the little set up of the table that had the laptop and the figurine. 

“I’ve been looking for that thing everywhere!” The familiar voice says just a few inches behind you and grabs the figurine. “What are you doing out here so early?” Anthony says and helps you with the equipment.

 “I was practicing.” You quietly thank him and start heading back towards the house. “I can’t sleep.”

“And here I thought you were hiding.” He jokes. The two of you go down the tunnel leading towards the garage.

 “We all know how well that worked out for me last time. Thanks for not having S.H.I.E.L.D come after me this time around.” You joke back. “I’m done hiding. We’ve both seen the kind of threats there are out there and what kind of horrible person would I be if I just stood by and let it happen knowing I can do what I do. That alien invasion really fucked with dad’s head and truth be told it’s fucking with mine.” 

“What’s fucking with you?” You heard your dad’s voice echo thru. He was in the middle of the garage testing another model of the Iron Man suit. “Oh , hey Jr. Didn’t know you were coming in.” 

“No way.” He laughed in excitement. He set down the figurine on the garage floor and rushed over to your dad to check out the new suit. “Mark 15? Where did you find the time to make 9 new suits?” He looked up at your dad in shock then looked back at you. You had made yourself comfortable in his desk chair and simply shrugged. “Is someone gonna answer my question?”

“It’s obvious. I’ve had a lot of free time on my hands.” Your dad shrugs. “Pepper’s running the company , Happy’s head of security and you kids are out doing your thing. I’m just doing what I do best.” Anthony looks up at your father confused.

“Take that thing for a test run , huh dad? When you get back we’ll have breakfast ready.” 

“Sounds like a plan.” He shuts the mask and waits for Anthony to move back , “See you in a bit.” He calls out as he flies out the tunnel.

 “What the hell? You wanna tell me what’s going on?” 

“I’ll explain while we cook him some breakfast. Unless you want to deal with dad while he’s hungry?”

“Point taken.”

——————————————

 “So you’ve been feeding off his fear?”  

“Not feeding off of him. God , you make me sound like a cannibal. I’ve just been removing that fear so he can sleep well. You should have seen him when I first got here. The man was a mess. Neck deep with designs on new Iron Man suits and prototypes of things he thought I could use. He was up for days before I even got here. He wouldn’t admit to it so I took matters in to my own hands.”

“By deceiving him in to thinking he’s getting better?” You set the plate of pancakes down on the table. Anthony followed shortly after with a plates of bacon and hash. 

“That’s not what I’m doing.” You justified. Anthony rolled his eyes not falling for the bullshit. “OK , you know what , sue me. He was using those machines as a distraction instead of addressing the problem. At least I had the decency to come check on him. Where the hell were you?!” 

“I’m gone for one hour and you two are already going at it?” Your dad is strolling in to the dining room in his day clothes now. “Do we need a time out shirt or do I need to go out and , I don’t know , buy new kids?” 

“I thought you liked our bickering?” You smirk. “I’ll grab the plates. Coffee?” 

“That smells amazing!” Your face lights up with happiness after hearing her voice. Pepper walks in to the dining room with a huge smile on her face. With Happy following right behind her.

“Pepper!” You rush over to her and embrace her in a tight hug. “I didn’t know you were gonna be joining us.”

“Are you kidding? You’re across the country and you’re finally all here together. I wasn’t gonna miss out on spending time with my favorite kids.” She smiles. Your dad clears his throat. “Oh , hush you. I see you everyday. So what are we having?” She walks across the dining room to join your dad and Anthony at the table and you continue towards the kitchen for the plate and utensils.

“Typical american breakfast. Go on , Happy , take a seat. We’ve made enough to feed an entire village.” You hear Anthony tell her. You set down the plates in front of everyone before taking a seat of your own.

 That morning  was filled with laughter , jokes and fun stories. It’s been a while since you were surrounded by happiness and love , you almost forgot about all those nightmares and New York. Almost. But you weren’t going to let that get in the way of enjoying your time with your family. Your dad was genuinely smiling and laughing with all of you , Happy was relaxed for once , and even with Stark Industries running smoothly  you can tell Pepper was enjoying this time as well. 

———————————

 You slammed shut the dishwasher after loading it and let out a huge yawn. The excitement from earlier made you forget how tired you really were. But after scarfing down all that delicious food it was catching up with you again.

 “No sleep again?” Your dad nearly startled you. You wiped your hair out of your face and chuckled softly. 

“I’m fine. Slowly slipping in to a food coma.” You lie. 

“Uh,  Pepper left these for you. She was in a rush to get back to the company but she wanted to make sure you got them.” He holds up a small stack of papers. “I’ve had a look at them and they’re no Picasso but they are good.” He jokes as you look thru each drawing. They were drawings of you in your combat gear. One alongside Iron Man and your brother in his lab coat with , what you could only assume were the Iron Man drones. Another one you were alongside the other Avengers. You looked over the others and you heart felt like it could just burst. 

 You let out a small laugh when you saw the one of you next to Captain America standing on top of a small hill of Chitauri Aliens and a heart drawn in between the two of you. “These are the cutest things I have ever seen.” You tell him.

“I hear Fury’s been wanting you on the team.” He casually leans back against the counter and folds his arms across his chest. You shake your head , folding the drawings in half and setting them down on the counter next to you.

“Don’t tell me you gave these to me so you can help his case.” You roll your eyes, “And like I told him. I’m not an Avenger. I just happen to be at the right place at the right time.”

“Sometimes that’s all it takes. I mean , you see how much the young ones look up to you. You saved thousands of people that day.”

“That’s nothing compared to the millions you saved.” You said without thinking. But to your surprise your dad didn’t flinch at the subtle mention of flying thru the wormhole. “Besides,” you quickly changed the subject. “I don’t think I would be able to handle the pressure of saving the world all the time.” 

“Compared to the pressure of taking care of me? That’s like a walk in the park.” He chuckled. 

You didn’t laugh along. “You’re my dad. Whether you like it or not I’m always gonna worry about you first.” The smile he had on his face disappeared. You watched him as he let out a long sigh and pushed himself off the counter.

“I don’t want your life to be all about worrying about me. To be honest I’m surprised you haven’t grown an ulcer from all the stress I’ve put on you. Intentional or not.” You opened your mouth to speak but he waved at you to be quiet, “just hear me out. I know what you’re doing here. I see what it’s done to you because of me. Honey , I love you.” He walked the short distance to you as he spoke and placed his hands on your shoulders. “I don’t want you to grow up regretting not doing things you should’ve at least taken a chance on. You’re 20 years old and you’re here with your old man. You know what I was doing when I was 20?”

“Please don’t tell me-”

“Creating you and your brother.”

“And you said it.” You roll your eyes. “So what you’re saying is you want me to go out and reproduce?” You chuckle.

“God no!” He gasps. “I just want you to go out and have a life that doesn’t revolve around taking care of me.”

“What’s wrong with that? If I didn’t know any better I think you just want me outta here.” 

“You caught me.” He raises his hands up. “I asked Pepper to move in and she agreed. We thought it was time.”

“And it is.” You smiled. “Yeah , ok. I get it. You two need your space.”

“Hey , but you know you’re always welcome here , right?”

“Of course. Whatever’s going on with you , just promise me you’ll get the help you need. Don’t let it get worse.” 

“I promise.” He holds his hand up as he says ,”Scout’s honor.”
